DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study will compare the effects of sodium ferric gluconate complex and iron sucrose on urine concentrations of various chemicals including protein
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Two Iron Preparations on Protein in the Urine
DOC.criteria: Moderate to severe anemia Iron deficiency Moderate to severe chronic kidney disease Age â‰¥ 18 or greater and able to give informed consent Receiving dialysis Known sensitivity to Sodium Ferric Gluconate Complex in Sucrose Injection, Iron sucrose USP, or any of their components Clinically unstable Indication of iron sufficiency
